keyPolicies.policyDescription: Four new bank holidays on UK patron saints' days.
A £10 minimum wage and an end to the pay cap for those who work in the public sector including the NHS.
Protect the pensions 'triple lock' so pensions rise every year - pensioners better off with Labour.
Reverse the cut to capital gains tax.
Halt all Conservative plans to close hospitals. The NHS under Labour will get the funding needed and will be protected from Tory privatisation.
Reintroduce an education maintenance allowance for 16 & 17 year olds in full time education to help low and middle income families.
Increase the carer's allowance by £10 per week.
Free school meals for all primary school children, paid for by VAT on private schools, and a cap on class sizes.
A Brexit deal that is in the interests of Erewash's businesses and families not an extreme Tory Brexit which will damage trade and jobs.
I pledge to support our armed forces. My husband served as a soldier in Afghanistan and I will always work to ensure that our forces are properly equipped and looked after.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Current national polling the Conservatives would win again in Erewash - only one locally to challenge government plans for more cuts to our NHS, social care, schools, the police and public services.

issues.brexitEurope: A Brexit deal that is in the interests of Erewash's businesses and families not an extreme Tory Brexit which will damage trade and jobs.
issues.economy: A £10 minimum wage and an end to the pay cap for those who work in the public sector including the NHS.
issues.education: Reintroduce an education maintenance allowance for 16 & 17 year olds in full time education to help low and middle income families.
issues.health: Halt all Conservative plans to close hospitals. The NHS under Labour will get the funding needed and will be protected from Tory privatisation.
issues.socialWelfare: Protect the pensions 'triple lock' so pensions rise every year - pensioners better off with Labour.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am proud to be your local Labour candidate for the election on June 8th. Send me to fight your corner in Parliament. I will never be scared to stand up for the things I believe in and the place I live.

quotes.text: We don't need another Conservative MP to nod through Government policies - we need a fighter who will put local people first.

images.caption: Catherine Atkinson, Labour Candidate for MP in Erewash
